  Chapter11.IntegrableOn f (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b) →
    Chapter11.AntiderivOn F f (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b) →
      Real.partialOrder.lt a b →
        ContinuousOn F (Set.Icc a b) →
          (∀ {x : Real},
              Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Icc a b) x →
                Eq ((fun x => F (Real.instMax.max (Real.instMin.min x b) a)) x) (F x)) →
            ContinuousOn (fun x => F (Real.instMax.max (Real.instMin.min x b) a))
                (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Ioo (instHSub.hSub a 1) (instHAdd.hAdd b 1)).toSet →
              ∀ (P : Chapter11.Partition (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b)),
                Eq
                    (P.intervals.sum fun J =>
                      Chapter11.α_length (fun x => F (Real.instMax.max (Real.instMin.min x b) a)) J)
                    (Chapter11.α_length (fun x => F (Real.instMax.max (Real.instMin.min x b) a))
                      (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b)) →
                  ∀ (J : Chapter11.BoundedInterval),
                    Not (Eq J.toSet Set.instEmptyCollection.emptyCollection) →
                      Real.linearOrder.lt J.a J.b →
                        And
                            (instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.le
                              (instHSub.hSub a (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv 2)) J.a)
                            (instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.le J.b
                              (instHAdd.hAdd b (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv 2))) →
                          Chapter11.BoundedInterval.instSubset.Subset J
                              (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Ioo (instHSub.hSub a 1) (instHAdd.hAdd b 1)) →
                            Chapter11.BoundedInterval.instSubset.Subset (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Ioo J.a J.b)
                                (Chapter11.BoundedInterval.Icc a b) →
                              ∀ (x : Real),
                                Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo J.a J.b) x →
                                  Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Icc a b) x →
